item.title: Step One: Hugo Introduction
item.description: Hello! Hello from Hugo! If you’re reading this in your browser, good job! The file content/post/step-one-hello-hugo.md has been converted into a complete html document by Hugo. Isn’t that pretty nifty? What is Hugo? Hugo is a static site generator written in go. It is ideal for creating fast, seldom-changing sites. The program is portable and has zero dependencies, and the sites it generates are easy to publish. A common use case for static site generators has been making blogs.
